title: 2014 NFC mega preview & Jon Beason
itunes:title: 2014 NFC mega preview & Jon Beason
description:
A room with some heroes -- Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler -- react to Josh Gordon's season-long suspension before a mega season preview of the NFC. Then, New York Giants linebacker Jon Beason joins the show to discuss the Giants defense, former teammate Cam Newton and analyzes some of the league's best linebackers like Luke Kuechly and Lavonte David.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
